description:
[h1][b]Handheld Laser Cutter[/b][/h1]
It can destroy blocks, parts, harvestables, and damage mobs.
Increase/Decrease the cutting size with R/Q.
[b]Range[/b]: 15 meters
[b]Damage dealt to mobs[/b]: 180/s

[h1][b]Mountable Laser Cutter[/b][/h1]
Same as the Handheld Laser Cutter, but has adjustable range and damage.

[h1][b]Laser Pistol[/b][/h1]
Primary fire: piercing laser projectiles that destroy blocks, parts, harvestables, and damage mobs.
[b]Max projectile life time[/b]: 15 seconds
[b]Damage dealt to mobs[/b]: 100 per hit, larger mobs may take damage multiple times
[b]Fire rate[/b]: 4/s

Secondary fire: explosive hitscan shot
[b]Fire rate[/b]: 0.5/s

Overdrive: Can be activated with the reload key(default: R). While overdrive is active, the primary fire's projectiles won't pierce objects, but they will explode on impact.
[b]Duration[/b]: 5s
[b]Cooldown[/b]: 10s


[h1]Credits[/h1]
[list]
    [*][b]Vajdani[/b] - Scripting, animation
    [*][b]Dart Frog[/b] - Handheld Laser Cutter model and thumbnail
    [*][b]DriVer[/b] - Laser Pistol model
[/list]
name: Laser Tools
